attributes.action: Debate a vote of no confidence in the Conservative party
attributes.additional_details: Since the last general election, the Conservative Party has proven that it is not fit to tackle the issues that are affecting the British people. It has been incredibly disorganised and the British people have suffered for this. It is the will of the people that a general election takes place so that in light of the Conservatives failures, we may consider a new governing party.
attributes.background: We the people have lost faith in the Conservative Party to effectively run this country. We are tired of the wreckage left in this governments wake and demand a vote of no confidence in order to trigger a general election.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for  a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
